amendment.description: To authorize the exchange of land at Maxwell Air Force Base, Alabama.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3214 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3214 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S5789; text: CR S5789) To authorize the exchange of land at Maxwell Air Force Base, Alabama.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3214 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
